about_the_game:
Titans of Commerce: A game where YOU! become the capitalist behind the shadows at the wake of WW1. Manipulate diplomacy, fund opposition's journals or even a coup! Triple your income via arms sales, profiting from global tension. Design, produce and sell the train, gun or ship of your will! Fund Governments and get hefty tax cuts. Improve your business day by day and open factories all around Europe. Thanks to the fund that were left to you with these tax cuts, improve your factories and even find talented people in their jobs and employ them! Or just live your life as a simple baker... All scenarios are possible with 20 different sectors to play with.


Topple Governments and Fund Politics

Meddle with politics, fund the party you like and help them get to power, in exchange; you can get several benefits and hefty tax cuts.

Profit From Politics, War and Peace

You can maintain relations with +40 different authentic parties throughout the Europe, benefit and thrive your business with your political connections.

Design Locomotives, Guns, Ships; Sell Them to Governments in Need 

You can design, produce and sell locomotives, ships and guns. You can utilize your political connections to bolster sense of threat between countries and incentivize governments to spend on your products! 

Establish 20 Different Factories and Workshops to Produce 52 Different Products

You can shape the world at the brink of war. Establish 20 different workshops and factories to produce 52 different products. You can profit from both war and peace thus you shall fabricate conflicts or resolve them with your connections to your interest.
